title: Claim/service not covered by this payer/contractor
description: The claim or service is not covered by the payer or contractor. You must send the claim to the correct payer or contractor.

title: Non-covered charge(s)
description: Charges are not covered by the patient's insurance plan. These may be excluded services or procedures.

title: Payment adjusted due to procedure overlap
description: The payment has been reduced because the reported procedure overlaps with another procedure on the same date of service.

title: Service not covered under patient's current benefit plan
description: This service is specifically excluded from coverage under the patient's current benefit plan.

title: Precertification/authorization absent
description: Precertification, prior authorization, or referral is required but was not obtained before services were rendered.

title: Deductible amount
description: The amount applied to the patient's annual deductible. This is the patient's responsibility to pay.

title: Non-covered services because this is not deemed a 'medical necessity'
description: The service is not covered because it is not considered medically necessary by the payer's criteria.

title: Document does not meet the criteria for the service billed
description: The documentation submitted does not support the level of service or procedure that was billed.

title: The benefit for this service is included in the payment for another service
description: Payment for this service is bundled with another service and is not separately reimbursable.

title: Claim lacks information needed for adjudication
description: The claim is missing required information such as diagnosis codes, procedure codes, or supporting documentation.

title: This service/equipment/drug is not covered under the patient's current benefit plan
description: The specific service, equipment, or drug is excluded from coverage under the patient's benefit plan.

title: The time limit for filing has expired
description: The claim was submitted after the payer's deadline for claim submission has passed.

title: Processed in excess of charges
description: The payment amount exceeds the billed charges. An adjustment is necessary to correct the overpayment.

title: Payment adjusted because this care may be covered by another payer
description: Another insurance plan may be primary for this service. Coordination of benefits is required.

title: This (these) diagnosis(es) is (are) not covered
description: The diagnosis code(s) reported are not covered under the patient's benefit plan for the services billed.
